Submodules

iyal_quality_analyzer.quality_analyzer module

Module contents

class iyal_quality_analyzer.Inference(cache_dir=None, model_name='sanujen/Tamil_Legacy_Roman_Classifier_V2', model_version='version_1')[source]

Bases: object

A class used to perform inference using a pre-trained BERT model for sequence classification.

cache_dir

Directory to cache the model. Default to absolute path of this file directory + models + {model_version}

Type:

str

model_name

Name of the pre-trained model on huggingface.co. Default to “sanujen/fyp_0”.

Type:

str

model_version

Version of the model. Default to “version_0”.

Type:

str

label_mapping

Mapping of label indices to label names.

Type:

dict

pipe

Pipeline for text classification.

Type:

transformers.pipelines.Pipeline

tokenizer

Tokenizer for the pre-trained model.

Type:

transformers.AutoTokenizer

model

Pre-trained BERT model for sequence classification.

Type:

transformers.BertForSequenceClassification

device

Device to run the model on (CPU or GPU).

Type:

torch.device

inference(word)[source]

Performs inference on the given word and returns the predicted label.

inference(word)[source]

Performs inference on the given word and returns the predicted label.

Parameters:

word (str) – The input word to classify.

Returns:

The predicted label for the input word.

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.auto_detect_encoding(legacy_text)[source]

Returns the encoding of the given legacy font-encoded text.

Parameters:

legacy_text (str) – The legacy font-encoded text.

Returns:

The encoding of the given text.

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.classify_unicode(input_text)[source]

Classifies input text into categories: - Raw Tamil Unicode - Tamil + English Unicode - English Unicode - Numeric - Mixed (Tamil + English + Numeric)

Parameters:

input_text (str) – The input text to classify.

Returns:

Classification type (‘raw_tamil’, ‘mixed’, ‘english’, ‘numeric’, ‘mixed_all’)

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.convert_legacy_to_unicode(legacy_text, encoding=None)[source]

Converts legacy Tamil font-encoded text into Unicode.

Parameters:

legacy_text (str) – The legacy font-encoded text.

Returns:

Converted Unicode text.

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.get_encoding_fun(model, input_text)[source]

Detects the encoding of the input text.

Parameters:

  • model (Inference) – The model to use for legacy font classification.

  • input_text (str) – The input text to analyze.

Returns:

The detected encoding.

Return type:

str

iyal_quality_analyzer.is_english_word(word)[source]

Checks if a given word exists in the English vocabulary.

Parameters:

word – The word to check.

Returns:

True if the word is in the English vocabulary, False otherwise.

iyal_quality_analyzer.is_special_case(input_text)[source]
Return type:

bool

iyal_quality_analyzer.multi_sentence_quality_analyzer(classifier, coll_to_stand, input_text, encoding=None, need_translation=False, colloquial_to_standard=False)[source]

Normalizes a block of text into Raw Tamil Unicode and tags the input type.

Parameters:

  • model (Inference) – The model to use for legacy font classification.

  • input_text (str) – The input text to normalize.

  • encoding (str) – The encoding of the input text (e.g., bamini2utf8, etc.).

  • need_translation (bool) – Flag to indicate if translation is needed.

Returns:

A tuple containing the normalized output and a list of sentence quality analysis results.

Return type:

tuple

iyal_quality_analyzer.single_word_quality_analyzer(model, input_word, word_id=0, encoding=None)[source]

Normalizes a single word into Raw Tamil Unicode and tags the input type.

Parameters:

  • model (Inference) – The model to use for legacy font classification.

  • input_word (str) – The input word to normalize.

  • encoding (str) – The encoding of the input text (e.g., bamini2utf8, etc.).

Returns:

A dictionary containing the input type and the normalized output.

Return type:

dict

Translates English text to Tamil.

Parameters:

Returns:

The translated Tamil text.

Return type:

str
